plot: Iterative Reconstruction of the Electron Density and Effective Atomic Number using a Non-Linear Forward Model
summary: System independent rho-e and Z-e (SIRZ) refers to a suite of methods for estimating the system independent material properties of an object scanned using dual-energy X-ray CT. The current state-of-the-art approach, SIRZ-2, makes certain approximations that lead to inaccurate estimates for large atomic numbered (Z-e) materials. They show that the magnitude of performance improvement using SirZ-3 increases with increasing values for Z-E.
